item.title: Contact
item.description: Please contact us through the following form for a swift reply. Thank you. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: About
item.description: Jalingo is an association of passionate individuals bringing technology to people Founded in 2017 Jalingo researches Blockchain, AI, and Mobile Technologies to identify their potential and use-cases for future software and services. Jalingo invests into companies that have a compelling business case utilizing those technologies. Jalingo was founded by Ingo Czok who has co-founded Tembit (now Serrala) a leader in cloud and mobile solutions for corporate payments and corporate banking portals.
